description: This source file defines a utility class AssetImageLoader that loads a specific image asset ('assets/images/sample_menu.png') and returns it as a base64-encoded data URL. It includes a method loadSampleMenuAsDataUrl() which handles loading, encoding, and error reporting.

classes.name: AssetImageLoader
classes.description: A utility class for loading bundled asset images as base64 data URLs.

methods.name: loadSampleMenuAsDataUrl
methods.description: Loads the sample menu PNG image asset, encodes it in base64, and returns the data URL string. Throws FlutterError if the asset cannot be loaded.
